title: 'Terrified' family of woman killed by Pennsylvania prison escapee is under 24-hour police watch
description: The "terrified" loved ones of the woman killed by an escaped Pennsylvania convict are under 24-hour police protection while remaining "barricaded inside" their home, officials said Thursday.

title: Jim Jordan to investigate alleged DOJ pressure campaign in Trump documents case
description: Rep. Jim Jordan is investigating lawyer Stanley Woodward's allegations of prosecutorial misconduct in the Trump classified documents case.

title: Danny Masterson sentenced to 30 years to life in prison
description: LOS ANGELES — “That ’70s Show” star Danny Masterson was sentenced Thursday to 30 years to life in prison for raping two women more than two decades ago at his Hollywood Hills home.

title: Warner Bros. suspends deals with Mindy Kaling, J.J. Abrams and other top creators
description: Warner Bros. Discovery on Wednesday suspended deals with some of the most high-profile writers in the television industry, including Mindy Kaling and J.J. Abrams.

title: Fulton County DA tears into Rep. Jim Jordan over his inquiry into Trump indictment
description: Fulton County District Attorney Fani Willis rebuked House Judiciary Committee Chair Jim Jordan for his decision to investigate the Georgia election interference probe that led to the indictment of former President Donald Trump.

title: NBCUniversal News Group chairman Cesar Conde among top honorees at Hispanic Heritage Awards
description: Latinos in media, entertainment and business are being recognized at the 36th Hispanic Heritage Awards, including NBCUniversal News Group chair Cesar Conde, Café Tacvba and Siete Foods.

title: These NFL teams have the best Super Bowl odds going into the new season
description: As the regular season of NFL football kicks off, here are the latest predictions on who has the best odds of winning Super Bowl LVIII in Las Vegas in 2024.

title: UAW leader warns of strike after Biden suggested he wasn't worried about talks failing
description: The leader of the United Auto Workers union on Thursday pushed back on President Joe Biden’s remarks last weekend dismissing the possibility of a looming strike.

title: Hurricane Lee forecast to 'rapidly intensify' into major Category 4 storm
description: Forecasters predict that Hurricane Lee, currently swirling in the Atlantic, will intensify into a major Category 4 hurricane by early Friday.

title: Bruce Springsteen postpones 8 September shows over health issue
description: Bruce Springsteen and the E Street Band are postponing eight shows this month as Springsteen is treated for a health condition, according to a post on his website.

title: Pennsylvania prison escape and Covid on the rise: Morning Rundown
description: Mitch McConnell, Joe Biden, Donald Trump, Morca Cave, Mark Dickey, Covid cases, Covid hospitalizations, Covid booster, Pennsylvania prison escape, Danelo Cavalcante, Julia Mazur, Matt Walsh

title: Former Trump aide Peter Navarro's trial set for closing arguments in contempt of Congress case
description: The trial has moved at a brisk pace, with opening statements and witness testimony taking just one day. The jury is expected to begin deliberating Thursday.

title: Senate unity puts House Republicans in a jam over government funding fight
description: The smooth bipartisan process has senators feeling they have the upper hand over the House, warning Speaker Kevin McCarthy that his GOP-only approach will fail.

title: McConnell’s freezes complicate Republican attacks on Biden’s age
description: Joe Biden and Mitch McConnell appear to be giving political cover to each other as they fend off questions about their advanced age and health issues.

title: 6th death in 6 weeks reported at Georgia’s Fulton County Jail
description: A 24-year-old man died at an Atlanta hospital after being found unresponsive at a jail that is already being investigated by federal authorities for potential civil rights violations.

title: How the number of abortions in each state has changed — in places it was legal this year
description: In most states where abortion was legal as of June, the number of abortions has increased compared to 2020, according to new estimates.

title: Republicans demand leaked documents about prosecutors' interactions with Hunter Biden's attorneys
description: In a letter obtained by NBC News, the chairs of three House committees argue Biden’s legal team relinquished communications protections by leaking to the press.

title: Turkey rescuers preparing complex effort to retrieve ill American from Morca Cave
description: Rescuers in Turkey are preparing a complex effort to reach an American who has fallen ill and has been trapped in a cave since Saturday, officials said.
